data.description:
GREENPILL  KENYA CLIMATE ROUND.

Our mission, build robust public goods program, Opportunity Experiment;- positive initiatives that enhance both the individual and community Sustainability.  Creating positive impact Key focus areas Environment, Air, Water, Soil, Biodiversity and clean Energy.

[![Whats-App-Image-2024-01-26-at-22-48-15.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/fRRpTJ9H/Whats-App-Image-2024-01-26-at-22-48-15.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/GH6qX3zY)

Greenpill kenya aims to bring about positive impact in communities and villages through community initiatives onboarding, Educational workshops and seminars, Regenerative agriculture, tree planting, environment river cleanups and other real use case studies i.e vermicomposting and biochar   

[![Screenshot-2024-03-07-122238.png](https://i.postimg.cc/cJ85CJRw/Screenshot-2024-03-07-122238.png)](https://postimg.cc/wtgkbgbj)                              

Regenerative agriculture and training best farming practices is at the the core we have an already set up  demo farm with great results that will serve as a real life regen hub.
[![1713291540784.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/LsJ9Cjzf/1713291540784.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/2qfN3b98)

[![1713291583317.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/3NtxNhm5/1713291583317.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/9wqhgvLJ)
[![1713291634634.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/g2v1HDtr/1713291634634.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/FYHP9j4Q)


                                                    

Greenpill Kenya has patnered with seedballs kenya purchasing tree seedballs and biochar for a mass reforestation initiative.                                                    https://www.seedballskenya.com/

Together with your support we can make a real impact addressing global climate challenges.

data.description:
GREENPILL KENYA CLIMATE ROUND.

Our mission, build robust public goods program, Opportunity Experiment;- positive initiatives that enhance both the individual and community Sustainability. Creating positive impact Key focus areas Environment, Air, Water, Soil, Biodiversity and clean Energy. 

Greenpill kenya aims to bring about positive impact in communities and villages through community initiatives onboarding, Educational workshops and seminars, Regenerative agriculture, tree planting, environment river cleanups and other real use case studies i.e vermicomposting and biochar

GREENPILL KENYA WEB3 PROJECT ON EARTH.

Our mission, build robust public goods program, Opportunity Experiment;- positive initiatives that enhance both the individual and community Sustainability.

Greenpill kenya aims to bring about web3 mass adoption in communities and villages through impact onboarding, Educational workshops and seminars, Regenerative agriculture and other real use case studies of web3 and blockchain technology.

[![Whats-App-Image-2024-01-26-at-22-48-15-1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/NFDJGJ9J/Whats-App-Image-2024-01-26-at-22-48-15-1.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/fS3jBvvm)

Regenerative agriculture and setting up a space to be able to host web3 workshops and seminars are also some of our current initiatives to foster web3 mass adoption
[![Screenshot-2024-03-07-122238-1.png](https://i.postimg.cc/MTqZhHy7/Screenshot-2024-03-07-122238-1.png)](https://postimg.cc/hJZqmSZv)
[![1713291583317.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/W3mHDbq1/1713291583317.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/WF3nCV7B)

Our scope of work includes river clean ups, plastic and organic waste collection , tree planting, and use of various frontier tech  ie vermicomposting  and biochar to boost soil health and carbon sequestration.

Impact onboarding where we incentivize our contributors via crypto sort of UBI. in turn educating and training on wallet creation, privacy and safety, ReFi, minting impact certificates and NFTs.


[![Whats-App-Image-2024-01-29-at-11-37-19-1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/d1V3hDLq/Whats-App-Image-2024-01-29-at-11-37-19-1.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/f31DFzcF)

[![Whats-App-Image-2024-01-26-at-22-48-23.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/W3dD9hj5/Whats-App-Image-2024-01-26-at-22-48-23.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/JDW407sX)

Greenpill Kenya values align with core gitcoin values we also thanks to Earth for funding Public Goods. 

It would be an awesome opportunity running an Earth NODE in Kenya.

Thanks in advance for your support it will go a long way both in short and long term goals.....
data.title: Greenpill Kenya  on Earth

data.description:
BIOCHAR CARBON REMOVAL POTENTIAL IN AGRICULTURE AND CONSTRUCTION. (BCR)

Our mission, build robust public goods program, Opportunity Experiment;-  Research positive biological carbon sequestration  and sustainable farming practices i.e. 
       
          a). Biochar; converting biomass into fine charcoal 
                dust, which can be stored in soils for long 
                periods, sequestering carbon. adding 
                 vermicompost which can replace fertilizers.
            b). Biochar in construction replacing a portion of 
                  cement with biochar can contribute to carbon  
                  sequestration and reduces the environmental 
                   impact of construction materials. 

Reference;
https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0254629919300602

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S221450952400010X#:~:text=Replacing%20a%20portion%20of%20cement,construction%20by%20facilitating%20soil%20improvement.  

Greenpill Kenya in the past 3 months we started a project experimenting with biochar and vermicompost, In Q4 our goal is on publishing decentralized journals and articles highlighting on our findings.

check out our experiments at Greenpill regen hub.


[![IMG-20240802-075150.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/05d7N05p/IMG-20240802-075150.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/HjnrZ5yx)


[![IMG-20240724-165207.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/0Nm2b0SY/IMG-20240724-165207.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/7CHyR7mh)

[![IMG-20240801-085438.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/1XQ5ZnY9/IMG-20240801-085438.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/62MNr3XS)

[![IMG-20240803-182918.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/L4DRRkm9/IMG-20240803-182918.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/LhJG31qw)



Together with your support we can make a real impact addressing global climate challenges.

data.title: Greenpill Kenya Octant community Round.

data.description:
**Regenerative Agriculture & Web3 Innovation Initiative** 

**Our initiative** tackles two interconnected challenges:  
1. **Environmental degradation** (soil health decline, deforestation)  
2. **Limited access to education/collaboration** in regenerative practices and web3 technologies.  

By combining ecological restoration with community-driven innovation, we create a **sustainable circular model** benefiting ecosystems and local communities.  

---

## Key Projects & Progress  

### 1. Regen Tourist Hub / Co-Working Spaces  
- **Problem Addressed:** Fragmented knowledge-sharing and lack of collaboration spaces for regenerative agriculture/web3.  
- **Solution:** Establish a Kenyan hub for workshops, global web3 leader engagement (e.g., Celo, Vitalik Buterin), and partnerships.  
- **Progress:**  
  - Hosted **5 events** (150+ attendees)  
  - Positioned Kenya as a global nexus for regenerative/web3 innovation.  
 


### 2. Organic Fertilizer Production  
- **Problem Addressed:** Reliance on synthetic fertilizers and poor soil health.  
- **Solution:** Scale compost/biochar production (**5+ tonnes made**) to replace chemicals, improve soil, and reduce waste.  
- **Progress:** Directly supplies our regenerative farming projects.  

### 3. Regenerative Farming & Tree Planting  
- **Problem Addressed:** Deforestation and unsustainable farming practices.  
- **Solution:** Planted **100+ trees** using organic fertilizer, creating a closed-loop system:  
  `fertilizer → crops → carbon sequestration`  

---

## Impact & Synergies  
- **Environmental:**  
  - Improved soil health  
  - Carbon capture via reforestation  
  - Reduced chemical fertilizer use  
- **Community:**  
  - Educated **150+ participants** on web3/regeneration  
  - Established Kenya as a global innovation hub  
- **Economic:**  
  - Self-sustaining revenue from Regen Hub and fertilizer sales  

---
 Link to the Ecocert   https://www.ecocertain.xyz/hypercert/42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-42875578232038246396385200536402794643456

Pic of the Ecocert
![alt text](https://www.ecocertain.xyz/_next/image?url=%2Fapi%2Fhypercert-image%2F42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-42875578232038246396385200536402794643456&w=640&q=75)

Proof of work link
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HM-gL_SxNaK_iJyzRbVgWeYrV-ujmEgbm3g8MSDBDXk/edit?tab=t.0

## Overall Vision  
*A self-sustaining ecosystem where*:  
- 🌱 **Regenerative agriculture** restores ecosystems  
- 💻 **Web3 innovation** enables decentralized collaboration  
- 📚 **Community education** combats climate change and economic inequity  

*Through this synergy, we aim to create lasting environmental and socioeconomic transformation.*  "
data.title: Greenpill Kenya Nature Stewards
Glo Dollar x Arbitrum DAO
data.description: We’re rallying all Web3 projects to start embedding philanthropy in their organization by integrating the Glo Dollar stablecoin in their platform and/or treasury. By doing so these organizations bring three benefits to the world: (1) directly contribute to funding basic incomes for people in extreme poverty, (2) spread the word about Glo Dollar to a bigger audience, indirectly growing basic income funding, and (3) opportunity to join the Glo Consortium to further collaborate on reducing extreme poverty. Glo Dollar is collaborating with Arbitrum DAO to bring a total of $10,000 in USDGLO in matching for organizations that embed philanthropy. Whether you're already part of the Glo Consortium or looking to dive into Glo, this round is for you.

questions.query: If applicable, describe how your project/community has been utilising or supporting the Celo ecosystem, or explain a roadmap for your plans to utilise, build with, or align with Celo.
questions.explanation: We are in the process of completion of the regen hub that will serve as a co-working space for celo builders and with recent launch of Ckes we plan to incentivize contributors and onboard projects to Ckes stablecoin that aligns with Celo vision.

data.text:
Partnerships and Collaboratins in the Celo ecosystem
Greenpill Kenya aligns with the Celo ecosystem’s mission to drive real-world impact through regenerative finance (ReFi) and climate action. By collaborating with global ReFi leaders and leveraging Celo’s carbon-negative, mobile-first blockchain infrastructure, Greenpill Kenya is advancing a vision of inclusive, decentralized solutions. Below is a refined summary of key partnerships and principles: 
1. Strategic Collaborations with ReFi Innovators** 
- **Gainforest**: Focused on climate coordination, this partnership supports data-driven reforestation and carbon offset initiatives, aligning with Celo’s commitment to environmental sustainability and its carbon-negative blockchain design . 
- **Hypercerts**: Enhances transparency in climate impact claims, integrating with Celo’s ReFi ecosystem, which includes projects like Loam (a regenerative agriculture marketplace) and impactMarket (Unconditional Basic Income for vulnerable communities) . 
- **AtlantisP2P**: Strengthens decentralized infrastructure, complementing Celo’s transition to an Ethereum Layer-2 (L2) network powered by Optimism’s OP Stack, which improves scalability and interoperability . 
Minted hypercert on celo and listed on Gainforest marketplace
![alt text](https://www.ecocertain.xyz/_next/image?url=%2Fapi%2Fhypercert-image%2F42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-42875578232038246396385200536402794643456&w=640&q=75)
https://www.ecocertain.xyz/hypercert/42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-42875578232038246396385200536402794643456
Created 3 bounties on AtlantisP2P foundry on celo
https://impactfoundry.atlantisp2p.com/organizations/67d2c15d8fcb1608ee7a49f1/view-bounties/67e556ca0ec47a08df54639c
https://impactfoundry.atlantisp2p.com/organizations/67d2c15d8fcb1608ee7a49f1/view-bounties/67e554e40ec47a08df546171
https://impactfoundry.atlantisp2p.com/organizations/67d2c15d8fcb1608ee7a49f1/view-bounties/67e5503d0ec47a08df545b74

data.name: Regen Coordination
data.description: The Regen Coordination Round is a proposal for a GG21 community round centered on the themes of Coordi-nations 3, Cosmo-localism 2, Bio-Regionalism 3, and Regenerative Finance (ReFi) 3. Bringing together GreenPill Network 1, ReFi DAO 1, Celo Regional DAOs 1 and Regens Unite 1, we aim to support a global movement of regenerative communities leveraging Web3 for real-world impact and addressing local needs. The round will feed into a program to support the further development of local community impact tracking methodologies, grant tooling interoperability, and integrated QF & RPGF. We have currently secured $60K in funding from Celo Public Goods, ReFi DAO and Greenpill and ask for Gitcoin’s backing as we embark on a shared mission to showcase how community coordination, Web3, and innovative financial mechanisms can enable ecological and social regeneration on a global scale.

data.title: Vermicompost 500kgs of chicken and cow manure, 100 kgs of biochar by burning tree figs and grass collected by our contributors

data.reason:
In Q3 we did a research on biochar and vermicomposting and as IPCC report notes Biochar is the safest, most durable and fastest way to draw down carbon today. ( https://www.reversecarbon.com/blog/ipcc-biochar-potential-to-remove-26-billion-tonnes-co2)
To date we have composted over tone of organic waste and produced over 200 kgs of fine biochar. Composting takes a duration of 3 months and we were able to fetch over 150kgs of sieved fine compost that we mixed with biochar to produce over 350kgs of organic fertilizer ready for free distribution to farmers

[![IMG-20240724-165207.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/0Nm2b0SY/IMG-20240724-165207.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/7CHyR7mh)

a).Composting one tone of organic waste both plant and animal for 2-3 months.
[![IMG-20240726-103320.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/3RwTfRGb/IMG-20240726-103320.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/06hFb9cp)

b). Sieve compost to get fine dust particles

[![IMG-20240726-104252.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/bwCWNjFK/IMG-20240726-104252.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/75zmmj4V)

c). Fine organic compost

[![IMG-20240802-205014.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/0y0HxmKQ/IMG-20240802-205014.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/184Kr8Hh)

d). Biochar production using organic plant waste, figs or tree branches, make use of an underground clay oven or an enclosed barbecue oven where oxygen doesn't mix with carbon during pyrolysis very important.

[![IMG-20240801-084336.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/Wp8jBtPn/IMG-20240801-084336.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/V5J3Mfvr)

f). Sieve the biochar

[![IMG-20240801-085438.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/1XQ5ZnY9/IMG-20240801-085438.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/62MNr3XS)

 g).Mix sieved biochar with fine organic compost ratio 1;1

[![IMG-20240801-085755.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/JntgS73T/IMG-20240801-085755.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/1nhJqQj6)

h). Add 15-20 litres of biogas digester slur or pig urine very rich in Nitrogen and Ammonia

[![IMG-20240801-090442.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/C5LtCXjk/IMG-20240801-090442.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/Fd8DNPCH)

i).Mix thorough and dry for a few days

[![IMG-20240801-185803.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/PxJLNwtT/IMG-20240801-185803.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/Q9LNyV9y)

Pack and store ready to be distributed to farmers as organic fertilizer, conducting environmental workshops and trainings, biochar is a rich soil enhancer that reduces irrigation and a long term carbon sink. The IPCC report highlighted biochar as one of the safest, most durable and fastest ways to draw down carbon. (carbon sequestration)

Greenpill Kenya will keep updating the test results with farmers from different regions.

In Q3 we did a research on biochar and vermicomposting and as IPCC report notes Biochar is the safest, most durable and fastest way to draw down carbon today. ( https://www.reversecarbon.com/blog/ipcc-biochar-potential-to-remove-26-billion-tonnes-co2)
To date we have composted over tone of organic waste and produced over 200 kgs of fine biochar. Composting takes a duration of 3 months and we were able to fetch over 150kgs of sieved fine compost that we mixed with biochar to produce over 350kgs of organic fertilizer ready for free distribution to farmers

[![IMG-20240724-165207.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/0Nm2b0SY/IMG-20240724-165207.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/7CHyR7mh)

data.name: Arbitrum

data.name: $EARTH
data.description: $EARTH - Digital currency backed by real world climate solutions, ecosystem services and solarpunk values

data.name: DeSci on Gitcoin
data.description: Desci community on Gitcoin

questions.query: How does your project support the mission or goals of DeSci?
questions.explanation: Publishing of open source content on biochar and vermicomposting in agriculture and construction reduction GHGs.

questions.query: Describe how funds from the grants program will be used for your project.
questions.explanation: Creating journals and articles in turn promotion and marketing towards mass adoption.

data.name: DeSci on Gitcoin
data.description: Desci community on Gitcoin

questions.query: If you've participated in past grant rounds, please share any new updates or milestones from the prior months (N/A if you are yet to participate).
questions.explanation: GG20 and Octant/Greenpill community round.  First milestone was building hub/farmhouse to host IRL workshops, trainings and seminars done and already hosted our first event onboarding folks to Octant app. impact onboarding through rver cleanups, waste collection and tree planting incentivizing contributors via crypto love to do it in GLM Tokens.

questions.query: Have you participated in any Octant epoch (Epoch 0 through Epoch 4) OR a previous Gitcoin Grants round? Please provide details and evidence of your participation.
questions.explanation:
https://builder.gitcoin.co/#/chains/42161/registry/0x/projects/0x54625ecdb3c216ae8f7d1b1d0eeeb81935558e5f6b351c47488ff803d4e60eb8

https://builder.gitcoin.co/#/chains/42161/registry/0x/projects/0xb74b54dcd26e8ea7d70f2cc43535572660622f891b81405fb269e020b08f9805

questions.query: Please describe how your project contributes to the growth and development of the Octant ecosystem.
questions.explanation: Octant brand visibility on our IRL public goods banners, Community Education,/training on staking GLM and how to vote on projects/snapshot proposals

questions.query: How does your project align with the round's focus on community and education within the Octant ecosystem?
questions.explanation: We are public goods maxi which aligns with octants vision of funding public goods

questions.query: Provide a clear roadmap of your project, detailing future milestones and deliverables. How does this demonstrate your commitment to long-term impact and growth within the Octant ecosystem?
questions.explanation: Hosting monthly IRL meetups onboard more folks to the Octant ecosystem, Phase 2 of the Regen hub is to have a residency that can host up to 10 builders for our Buider and Hackathon sessions.

questions.query: Describe your team's expertise and how it contributes to the successful execution of your project.
questions.explanation: David mortech Economist by profession, Ardent DAOIst web3 space since 2017.

questions.query: How does your project complement or enhance existing initiatives within the Octant ecosystem rather than competing directly against them?
questions.explanation: We have partnered with previou and current epoch rounds projects namely PIZZADAO, GREENPILL DEV GUILD scoping for more collaborations.

questions.query: Describe your approach to community engagement and how you plan to contribute to a collaborative and constructive funding environment.
questions.explanation: The best form of community engagement on top of twitter threads, tweets and retweets is impact onboarding and giving out incentives in Glm.

questions.query: How do you plan to use the funding to maximize your project's ongoing impact within the Octant ecosystem if selected?
questions.explanation: Education, creating content and hosting more IRL events.

questions.query: What unique educational content or resources have you created for the Octant ecosystem? How has the community received these? Please share any relevant links
questions.explanation: Mostly through IRL trainings on how to interact with octant app from staking to voting, looking to onboard more public goods maxxis for upcoming and future epochs.

data.name: Octant
data.description: Octant is a platform that enables users to lock GLM, earn ETH rewards, and fund projects they care about.
